description.value: Made of interlocking metal rings, chain mail includes a layer of quilted fabric worn underneath the mail to prevent chafing and to cushion the impact of blows. The suit includes gauntlets.
A shield is made from wood or metal and is carried in one hand. Wielding a shield increases your Armor Class by 2. You can benefit from only one shield at a time.

The dread warrior makes two melee attacks.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d8 + @mod type=slashing average=true]] damage, or [[/damage 1d10 + @mod type=slashing average=true]] damage if wielded with two hands.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 1d6 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

&Reference[undead]{Undead} Fortitude. If damage reduces the dread warrior to 0 hit points, it must make a &Reference[con]{Constitution} saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is &Reference[radiant]{radiant} or from a critical hit. On a success, the dread warrior drops to 1 hit point instead.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].
